overview:
Morgan Linton is an entrepreneur, domain investor, and popular blogger. Morgan began investing in domain names in 2007 with a focus on developing exact-match domain names. He started his blog in October of 2007 to share his investments strategies and lessons learned while building his business.

Over the course of four years Morgan acquired over 1,000 domain names turning over 200 of them into online brands. Morgan has spoken at conferences in Ireland, England, Vancouver, and even in the Bahamas.

In 2011 Morgan and his fiance Daina started Appraiso, a solution for appraising website resale prices and catching potential scams. Later in 2011, Morgan attended Lean Startup Machine in New York City and formed a team to create a next-generation recruiting platform - NYC Hired.

Now, in 2012 Morgan and Daina have teamed-up to create StartupNook.com, a blog covering the growing startup space (often called “Silicon Beach”) in Los Angeles. Morgan continues to be actively involved in the Domain Space and Startup World with a keen interest in the Lean Startup Movement.

milestones.description: Linton Investments Partners With Domain Advisors
milestones.source_description: DomainAdvisors.com Partners With Morgan Linton Investments to Expand Services at the PPX International Unit
